LanguageData.CommandBedSetForOwnerTypeDesc: Whether beds in this room should be used by colonists, prisoners or slaves.
LanguageData.CommandNeuralSuperchargerNoAutoUseDescri: None of your people will use this neural supercharger automatically.
LanguageData.CommandNeuralSuperchargerAutoUseWithDesi: Your people may use this neural supercharger automatically, if they want to because of their beliefs.
LanguageData.CommandNeuralSuperchargerAutoForEveryone: All of your people will use this neural supercharger if they get the chance.
LanguageData.CommandNeuralSuperchargerAllowGuestsDesc: Allow this neural supercharger to be used by temporary faction members.
LanguageData.CommandHealInHealingPodDesc: If this creature is injured, it will return to its connected Gauranlen tree and enter a woody healing pod. After {DAYS} days, the dryad will emerge with its wounds healed.
